A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Ryan Johnson decided to subvert expectations across the board...  which can sometimes be neat...  but when it's this heavy handed\,  it makes it hard to take any if the dramatic parts seriously.

Also hard to look past ideologically driven cast and plot choices. I hate to even mention it\, but it's really distracting.  

Too long..  tone and pacing issues...  great visuals
